preferences.name: displayCompletionDate
preferences.label: Display Completion Date
preferences.description: When enabled, the completion date will be displayed as a list item accessory.

preferences.name: useTimeOfDayGrouping
preferences.label: Use Time of Day Grouping
preferences.description: When enabled, today's reminders will be grouped by the time of day they are due.

preferences.name: selectDefaultList
preferences.label: Initially select the default list
preferences.description: When enabled, the Reminders's default list will be initially selected instead of the last used list.

preferences.name: selectTodayAsDefault
preferences.label: Initially select "Today" for new reminders
preferences.description: When enabled, "Today" will be initially selected for new reminders instead of no due date.

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar Reminders
commands.subtitle: Apple Reminders
commands.description: Manage your reminders in the menu bar.

preferences.name: titleType
preferences.title: Title
preferences.description: Choose what you want to see next to the menu bar icon.

preferences.name: view
preferences.title: View
preferences.description: Choose which view you want to see in your menu bar.

preferences.name: countType
preferences.title: Count
preferences.description: Choose which count you want to see in your menu bar.

preferences.name: hideMenuBarCountWhenEmpty
preferences.label: Hide menu bar count when empty
preferences.description: When enabled, the number of reminders will be hidden if there are no reminders left ("Display menu bar count" needs to be enabled)

preferences.name: sortMenuBarRemindersByDueDate
preferences.label: Sort menu bar reminders by time
preferences.description: When enabled, the reminders in the menu bar will be sorted by time.
preferences.title: Sort

commands.name: quick-add-reminder
commands.title: Quick Add Reminder
commands.subtitle: Apple Reminders
commands.description: Quickly add a reminder in Reminders.

preferences.name: dontUseAI
preferences.label: Don't use the AI
preferences.description: When enabled, the reminder is simply added to your default list with the input as the title.

preferences.name: shouldCloseMainWindow
preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.label: Close window immediately
preferences.description: When enabled, the Raycast window is closed immediately, allowing you to carry on with other work.
